content: So, we're not done yet, but I as telling @Santiago Pastorino the other day that — apart from performance — the list of to-do items is starting to get thin. It seems like the light is at the end of the tunnel. This is pretty exciting!

apart from unknowns from the future crater run, seems like the 2PB expansion might be the « biggest » feature request left (in terms of impact in accepting code in the wild, not in difficulty, which I have no idea about ;)
/me quietly repeats "polonius" in a subliminal manner
@Jake Goulding to keep you happy I’ll open a polonius PR next week for cfg compression
maybe the treefrog stuff if we can merge the PRs in :frog: first
i was about to say that we still have :frog: to worry about
